name: MAOEVER Neti Pot Sinus Rinse Bottle Nose Wash Cleaner Pressure Rinse Nasal Irrigation for Adult & Kid BPA Free 300 ML with 30 Nasal Wash Salt Packets and Sticker Thermometer(Blue)
short_description: Valve-Controlled Water Flow Neti Pot – Gentle and Beginner-Friendly: Designed with an innovative valve system, this non-squeeze nasal rinse bottle ensures a controlled and steady flow based on air pressure, eliminating the need for manual squeezing. This makes it a safe and comfortable option for beginners, sinus rinse, and nasal care.

Anti-Backflow Design – Enhancing Hygiene & Safety: The built-in one-way anti-backflow valve prevents used water from re-entering the neti pot bottle. This design is particularly helpful for individuals prone to sinus discomfort.

BPA-Free, Food-Grade PP Material Neti Pot– Safe & Durable: Made from high-quality, BPA-free polypropylene (PP) material, this nasal irrigation bottle is odorless and built for long-term use. Its smooth design ensures a comfortable nasal rinse experience, making it suitable for adults and children alike. It operates without batteries, offering a more energy-saving and convenient solution.

Pre-Measured Saline Packs – Convenient & Effective Cleansing: This kit includes 30 individually sealed nasal wash salt packets, precisely formulated to create an isotonic rinse(with 300ml water) for effective removal of dust, mucus, and other nasal irritants. Ideal for daily use and sinus discomfort.

300ml Large Capacity Neti Pot– Designed for Home & Travel Use: The 300ml bottle capacity allows for a full rinse of both nostrils without the need for refilling, making the process more efficient. Its lightweight, travel-friendly design ensures that you can maintain nasal hygiene whether you're at home, at work, or on the go.
Important Safety Reminder: Always use boiled, cooled water (recommended 98°F ±5°F / 37°C ±3°C) to ensure a safe and comfortable rinsing experience.

short_description: 【Steady and Non-Chocked Flow】 Compared to traditional manual neti pots, sinus rinse machine’s water flow intensity and speed are more stable and gentle, and water direction is more accurate, ensure a comfortable flushing process, give you fresh and smooth breathing.

【Free Adjustment of 4 Pressure Modes】 Low mode, high mode, pulse mode, DIY mode, you can choose your own water pressure mode, rinse the nasal cavity and sinus, enhance cilia function, ensure health of nose, suit for adults, older and over-8-years-old children.

【Powerful Long-Time Life & Waterproof Type-C Battery】Fully charged in 4 hours, can be used continuously for about 21 days, equipped with 40 inches long Type-C cable (without adapter), can be charged at any time by mobile, computers, laptops, etc. Professional waterproof design ensure you use nasal irrigation system safely.

【Ergonomically-Designed-Nozzles】 3 Kinds of nozzles for adults or children, shaped to fit the nostrils of all ages, including a gentle flow nozzle for first-time use or nasal massage to make nasal cleaning process smoother.
【Easy Maintenance & Troubleshooting】If water flow weakens or the water tank becomes hard to open, it may be due to a clogged air vent. Gently clear the vent with a soft, dry cloth or a cotton swab.

【Instructions & Saline Solution Ratio】Always use a 0.9% isotonic saline solution (recommended ratio: mix one 2.34‑gram saline packet with 260 ml of water) to avoid nasal irritation. This product is not intended for children under 8 years of age; users should breathe through the mouth during operation. Do not use if you have an ear infection, ear blockage, or complete nasal obstruction. The product supports a 30‑day return policy, and one free replacement is available for accidental damage.

The unit sits conveniently on your countertop and uses a fingertip control extendable to 30 inches, eliminating the need to hold a heavy unit against your face. short_description: RELIEF IN JUST 30 SECONDS: Naväge combats congestion caused by mucus, allergens, germs, and irritants with powered suction that quickly flushes nasal passages for drug-free, lasting relief.
CLEANER, SAFER, SMARTER: Discover how easy and comfortable nasal rinsing can be with Naväge: Its lightweight design allows easy one-handed use and pre-packaged SaltPods mean no mixing, no mess.

THREE SIMPLE STEPS: PRIME your device by filling the tank with distilled water and insert a new SaltPod. POSITION your nostrils on the nose pillows. POWER the rinse + suction with the touch of a button and instantly flush your nasal passages.

SAFETY FEATURE: For a consistently safe, comfortable, and invigorating rinse, always keep the SaltPod chamber closed until the cycle is complete. Opening it mid-rinse activates a safety mechanism, stopping the device.

QUICK START & TROUBLESHOOTING: Fill with distilled water, add a SaltPod, and position nose pillows for a firm seal (do not reopen chamber). If reduced suction occurs easily troubleshoot by checking battery orientation, lid, or pillow adjustment. product_description: SinuCleanse Nasal Wash products were developed by a leading Ear Nose & Throat Physician as an all-natural way to safely & effectively relieve nasal congestion and sinus symptoms without the worry of harmful side-effects or drug interactions. Studies suggest that Nasal Washing regularly may reduce the duration and frequency of cold & flu symptoms and promote long term nasal health. Nasal Washing moisturizes dry nasal passages and aids in the removal of mucus and irritants such as dust particles, pollen, and other debris, keeping nasal passages clear and allowing you to breathe easier. The SinuCleanse All-Natural Pharmaceutical Grade Pre-Mixed Saline Packets are made in the USA in an FDA Registered Drug Facility. Each packet contains all-natural, preservative free, ultra-fine salt granules which when mixed with water dissolve instantly to form a buffered salt water solution that will not sting or burn, making nasal washing easy and comfortable. They may be used in most other Nasal Wash Systems and can be used to form an Isotonic or Hypertonic Solution. (See instruction sheet inside box for more information).
